question: Please answer the following questions
answer:
QUESTION

 Please answer the following questions

1- is it permissible to touch anus of wife with hand?
2- can one enter finger in the anus of his wife.

I know that anal sex is strictly prohibited in shariah.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

Hayaa (modesty) is a hall mark of every Mu’min. Hayaa is part of Imaan and a believer will always have to govern himself/herself to acts of Hayaa and modesty.

It is not appropriate and is against shame and modesty for a person to do any of the things that you have stated.

And Allah knows best 

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
